name: Monotonic Function -- from Wolfram MathWorldmathworld.wolfram.com › MonotonicFunction
description: A monotonic function is a function which is either entirely nonincreasing or nondecreasing. A function is monotonic if its first derivative (which need not be continuous) does not change sign.
